text: 1980 polio got me 25yrs after #Vaccine released in India all b/c poverty.41yrs later I'm in Canada &received 2nd #Moderna #COVID19 vaccine. #COVAX seeking additional US$2B,@ACTAccelerator$gap 4 COVAX= US$22.1B.We all win when everyone contributes! #VaccinesWork #VaxLive @DrTedros https://t.co/F5B0WSGhXI
